H0.text: Coal is the best renewable source of energy for a homeowner who wants to use a renewable source of energy to heat the home.

H1.text: Gas is the best renewable source of energy for a homeowner who wants to heat the home.

H2.text: Oil is the best source of energy for heating a home for a homeowner who wants to use a renewable source of energy.

H3.text: Solar is the best renewable source of energy for a homeowner who wants to use renewable energy to heat the home.

A4.text: Solar air heating is a renewable energy heating technology used to heat or condition air for buildings or process heat applications.

A5.text: Many applications can utilize solar air heat technologies to reduce the carbon footprint from the use of conventional heat sources, such as fossil fuels, to create a sustainable means to produce thermal energy.
